title: Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ 1.8.0 released!
content: We are very pleased to announce the 1.8.0 release of Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ. This release adds support for CodeLens for REST endpoints and enhances MicroProfile Fault Tolerance and Metrics supports.
